description: Bitcoin is the first cryptocurrency, created in 2009 by Satoshi Nakamoto. It’s a decentralized currency not controlled by any government.
Ethereum is a blockchain that supports smart contracts. It's the foundation for many DeFi apps and NFTs.
A wallet stores your crypto. Can be software (like MetaMask) or hardware (like Ledger). Never share your seed phrase!
Any cryptocurrency that isn't Bitcoin is an altcoin — includes ETH, SOL, ADA, etc.
